last_episode_to_air.name: Cut to the Quick
last_episode_to_air.overview: It is the annual trials to set the rankings for the Pine Hollow students and Veronica is looking down the barrel of coming second to Stevie … this prompts Veronica to do something extreme.

name: The Saddle Club
overview: The Saddle Club is a children's television series based on the books written by Bonnie Bryant Like the book series, the scripted live action series follows the lives of three teenage girls in training to compete in equestrian competitions at the fictional Pine Hollow Stables, while dealing with problems in their personal lives.  Throughout the series, The Saddle Club navigates their rivalry with Veronica, training for competitions, horse shows, and the quotidian dramas that arise between friends and staff in the fictional Pine Hollow Stables. In each show, The Saddle Club prevails over its adversities, usually sending a message emphasizing the importance of friendship and teamwork.

episodes.name: The Saddle Club
episodes.overview: On her first day at Pine Hollow Stables, Lisa Atwood is befriended by snobby Veronica diAngelo. However, when Lisa foils Veronica's plan to endanger Stevie Lake, Lisa proves to Stevie and Carole Hanson that she is best friend material after all.

episodes.name: Work Horses
episodes.overview: As the Saddle Club plans to horsenap Prancer from her owner before he can sell the mare to the slaughterhouse, their plan suddenly changes when they discover poor Prancer has colic.

episodes.name: Trail Ride (1)
episodes.overview: While on the Mountain Trail Overnight, Veronica develops a crush on Phil Marsten, but she soon discovers that he only has eyes for her rival, Stevie .So, in an attempt to get Phil's attention, Veronica endangers herself and her horse and winds up alone and unconscious on the trail.

episodes.name: Trail Ride (2)
episodes.overview: When Veronica's horse, Cobalt, returns to camp riderless, the Saddle Club along with Phil, put themselves in huge danger to rescue an injured Veronica.

episodes.name: Horse Shy
episodes.overview: Just as they are teaching Lisa to canter, the Saddle Club is caught in a sudden storm. This leaves Stevie and Carole stranded on a cliffside and Lisa to overcome her fear of cantering and ride for help.

episodes.name: Mystery Weekend
episodes.overview: Phil and his Pony Club come to Pine Hollow to participate in a mystery weekend to raise funds. However, they soon discover there is a real thief in their midst and the Saddle Club sets out to catch the culprit once and for all.

episodes.name: School Horse
episodes.overview: Max reverses his decision to sell Prancer after the horse saves the girls from certain death by killing a poisonous snake.

episodes.name: Star Quality
episodes.overview: The girls have to teach teenage heart-throb Skye Ransom how to ride to save his movie career.

episodes.name: Herdbound
episodes.overview: When Lisa's mother decides to enroll Lisa in a private boarding school, Carole and Stevie do everything they can to stop Lisa from attending it.

episodes.name: Greener Pastures (1)
episodes.overview: While working with veterinarian Judy Barker, Carole can't help but compare herself to her late mother, Karen. Carole is unable to deal with the loss of her mothe and  is devastated when Veronica causes a fatal accident to her horse, Cobalt.

episodes.name: Greener Pastures (2)
episodes.overview: With help from her father, Carole comes to terms with her mother's death and Cobalt's and is soon thrilled to learn that Delilah is pregnant with Cobalt's foal.

episodes.name: Jumping to Conclusions
episodes.overview: Stevie and Carole naturally blame Veronica when Lisa's school horse, Prancer, starts to act sluggish and unresponsive. However, Phil thinks he knows the true reason.

episodes.name: Set Up
episodes.overview: The Saddle Club girls think that Deborah has asked Max to sell Pine Hollow Stables. They succeed in breaking up the couple, only to realize that Max's happiness is more important to them than any stable.

episodes.name: Runaway (a.k.a. Over the Bit)
episodes.overview: Red's cousin Liam, begins lying to everyone he meets at Pine Hollow in an effort to fit in. He soon redeems himself when Lisa when  has an acute attack of appendicitis.

episodes.name: Gift Horse
episodes.overview: Carole feels like The Saddle Club is falling apart: Stevie's too busy with her old friend, Tina, and Lisa's obsessed with beating out Veronica for the lead in the school play. The birth of Delilah's foal brings the Saddle Club together again

episodes.name: Flying Change
episodes.overview: When Veronica appears to be neglecting her new horse, Garnet, in the same way she did with Cobalt, the Saddle Club girls enlist Phil's help to switch horses on Veronica and teach her a lesson.

episodes.name: Jump Off
episodes.overview: During a western riding clinic at Pine Hollow, Stevie rescues an abandoned mare and names her Belle. Deborah writes an article about Stevie and Belle and their photo appears in the paper.

episodes.name: Found Horse (1)
episodes.overview: Belle's rightful owner, Chelsea, sees the picture of Stevie and Belle in the newspaper and travels to Pine Hollow to take back her horse. When Belle runs away from Chelsea and will only respond to Stevie, Chelsea decides that Belle's place is with Stevie at Pine Hollow.

episodes.name: Found Horse (2)
episodes.overview: Carole's role as best junior rider at Pine Hollow is threatened by the arrival of a talented, new rider, Andrea Barry.

episodes.name: Across the Board
episodes.overview: Determined to break up the Saddle Club once and for all, Veronica makes a bet with Carole Carole can't go a day without running to Stevie and Lisa with information. Carole counters that Veronica couldn't manage even one day of doing her own barn chores. The loser must leave Pine Hollow.

episodes.name: Track Record
episodes.overview: When a barn fire damages the hayloft and endangers Max's horses, Max comes down hard on Red for his negligence, and Red quits. The Saddle Club girls must find a way to get Red back.

episodes.name: First Refusal
episodes.overview: Much to Lisa's horror, Lisa's mother invites Veronica to stay with them while Veronica's parents are away. Carole and Stevie are hurt when Veronica tells them what Lisa wrote about them in her diary. Meanwhile, Deborah proposes to Max.

episodes.name: Horse Play
episodes.overview: Lisa and Veronica are forced to work together on the annual Pine Hollow costume party. Lisa gets even with Stevie for her practical jokes by staging an eerie prank of her own.

episodes.name: High Horse
episodes.overview: Everyone is surprised when a visiting "horse whisperer" praises Kristi for her natural talent. Kristi's swollen ego becomes unbearable when she is selected to star in a live sports segment for a kids TV show.

episodes.name: Bridle Path (1)
episodes.overview: In this episode, Lisa wants to win first place at a competition but the jumps are to high for her. When she first practices Prancer refuses to jump it and Lisa goes flying over the jump and she goes into a coma. Melanie teaches Camanche to take things of the top of his stall and Deborah asks her to give Mrs. Reg the wedding rings and when Camanche knocks it off the stall door Meliane thinks he ate them. Since Lisa is in a coma, Max and Deborah decide to postpone their wedding. Despite Carole and Stevie's attempt to wake Lisa up, it fails.

episodes.name: Bridle Path (2)
episodes.overview: When Carole and Stevie's efforts awaken comatose Lisa, Pine Hollow is thrown into a frenzy to get Max and Deborah's wedding back on track. Also, Stevie and Phil finally admit they like each other.

episodes.name: A Horse of a Different Color (1)
episodes.overview: A valuable horse named Hugo is transported from France arrives at Pine Hollow but escapes into danger. A thief seems to be operating in the stables and Veronica is blaming Scooter.

episodes.name: A Horse of a Different Color (2)
episodes.overview: The valuable French horse is not everything it appears to be and the Saddle Club must find the real one quickly.

episodes.name: Show Ponies (1)
episodes.overview: Dorothe Doutey, the French Junior Champion arrives at Pine Hollow and rumours begin to fly.

episodes.name: Show Ponies (2)
episodes.overview: The Saddle Club coaxes Dorothee into riding Hugo again by getting Veronica to buy him. Veronica agrees to buy him, if she can sing with the Saddle Club at their first gig.

episodes.name: The Ride of His Life
episodes.overview: The Equine infection endangering the horses could mean the end of Pine Hollow and when Comanche gets sick, The Saddle Club try to do their best to try and save the horse.

episodes.name: Love is in The Air
episodes.overview: Stevie and Phil's first date almost turns into disaster and Red coaxes Doroth'e into facing her demons and jumping Hugo again.

episodes.name: Horsenapped
episodes.overview: When Veronica's horse, Garnet, is kidnapped, The Saddle Club sets out to solve the mystery. Meanwhile, Murray is driving Carole mad, both at home and at Pine Hollow. When Carole finds out that Murray might be involved in Garnet's kidnapping, she sets out to find out the real truth. Dorothée is invited by the French Olympic Panel to trial for selection for the Olympic Training Squad, but if she passes, it means leaving Pine Hollow and Red.

episodes.name: Au revoir Dorothee
episodes.overview: Both Dorothée and Max are faced with important decisions. The stables are divided about whether Dorothée should pursue her love with Red or her career as a show jumper. But in the end, the decision might lie with Dorothée's horse, Hugo.

episodes.name: The Home Straight
episodes.overview: When Pepper gets old, The Saddle Club is faced with the difficult task of finding a way for an old man and an old horse to enjoy a useful old age. Max's cousin, Drew takes over the stables while Max is away.

episodes.name: Running Free (1)
episodes.overview: The Saddle Club befriend Raffael and his mother, both itinerant workers, who arrive at Willow Creek with Raffael's beautiful horse, Diablo. Then Raffael is accused of horse-theft by a local farmer. Melanie and Ashley set up a Pine Hollow news sheet complete with gossip column. Lisa begins to like Raffael. Diablo comes up missing and the girls, Phil, and Raffael set out to find him.

episodes.name: Running Free (2)
episodes.overview: The Saddle Club help Raffael rescue his horse, but he is forced to offer Diablo for sale when his family's life savings are stolen. Mrs. Atwood buys Diablo for Lisa so Raffael will leave. Lisa is especially saddened by Raffael's departure. Lisa does the right thing and sets Diablo free to roam in the wild.

episodes.name: Race Against Time
episodes.overview: Peeved that Lisa won the captaincy of the Navigation Riding Team to take on Cross County, Veronica sets out to prove Phil is poisoning their horses so his club will have the advantage. When Lisa and Veronica find the cause of their horses' illness, it is a race to prevent the town's drinking water from being affected by poison. Stevie tries for her C-level Equestrian Certificate.

episodes.name: Stevie's Bad Day
episodes.overview: Stevie's judgment is clouded by her attempts to camouflage a pimple, and then she doesn't wear a helmet when riding out in the field on Belle. She then falls off and gets a bump on her head. Meanwhile, Veronica arranges to have a potential Olympic champion take her place so Kristi's team will win the prize of having their photograph in a prominent equestrian magazine. During the competition, Lisa and Carole find out why Stevie has been acting weird in the saddle and when waiting to ride in the competition.

episodes.name: Fillies v. Colts
episodes.overview: Stevie challenges the boys to a Survivor style camp-off to determine who is the better sex, while Melanie and Ashley have their own gender battle with a new rider named Nick. And Deborah is convinced that a monster is lurking in the woods.

episodes.name: Blind Faith
episodes.overview: When visually impaired students visit Pine Hollow, The Saddle Club helps a young blind girl named Jenna conquer her fear of horses, and in the process prove to her overly protective mother that she can live an independent life. Red's cousin, Liam, falls for Jenna, but gets tongue-tied whenever she comes near.

episodes.name: Join Up
episodes.overview: A dance has all of Pine Hollow seeking a date, and Kristi schemes to snare Red as her partner. Carole's attempts at matchmaking end in disaster, especially when she tries to make over a boy for Lisa, and her efforts almost split up The Saddle Club when she actually falls in love with the boy.

episodes.name: Tenderfoot
episodes.overview: Carole, Stevie, and Lisa are worried when Belle comes down with a mysterious illness that even the new young vet can't diagnose. Red is left to manage Pine Hollow on his own. With everyone busy, Melanie and Ashley set out to ride an uncontrollable horse named Angel who seems to have a problem of running off with her rider.Then they get stranded in the middle of nowhere when they fall off Angel. The new vet saves Belle's life when he removes the painted wood from her leg.

episodes.name: Bloodlines
episodes.overview: The Saddle Club befriend a young painter who turns out to be Kristi's long lost big sister, Chelsea. Melanie is upset by Lisa and doesn't want to be her sister any more. Veronica is jealous because she doesn't want to share Kristi with Chelsea. Meanwhile, Kristi and Veronica have the opinion that Chelsea is out to get everyone because she wants to know their star signs and their birthdays.

episodes.name: Foster Horse (3)
episodes.overview: Lisa gains Storm's trust, but his ultimate test is still to come. The Saddle Club is distressed that the trails will have to be sold to save Pine Hollow.

episodes.name: High Stakes (1)
episodes.overview: Carole assists a famous trainer with Mr. diAngelo's promising young racehorse, Windsong. With her father's new investment in Pine Hollow, Veronica lords her newfound status over the other kids at Pine Hollow as Executive Student President. She instantly takes advantage and reassigns the horse assignments and insults Red, who rethinks his future at Pine Hollow.

episodes.name: High Stakes (2)
episodes.overview: Carole blames herself for the erratic performance of Windsong. Veronica is distressed when her father informs her that they are no longer rich and that they'll have to sell Windsong. Veronica loses her power and Kristi makes a video to try and convince Red to stay.

episodes.name: Odd Girl Out
episodes.overview: The riders have to ride in pairs in the Cross Country Challenge and the two odd girls, Carole and Veronica, pair up. A new girl, Tracey, causes tension between Melanie and Ashley.

episodes.name: Horse's Keeper
episodes.overview: When Veronica is forced to work under the supervision of Stevie at the stables to pay for Garnet's board, she decides to sell Garnet. Once the sale is made, Veronica bitterly regrets this decision and The Saddle Club feel sorry for her. They convince Garnet's new owner to sell her back to Veronica. Veronica is relieved that Garnet is back.

episodes.name: Finishing Strongly
episodes.overview: The bank is foreclosing on Pine Hollow, and The Saddle Club arranges a rummage sale to help the Regnerys, with unexpected surprises.

episodes.name: Back in the Saddle
episodes.overview: The Saddle Club is challenged to a race by Veronica, who’s use of electronic devices to win the competition lead her into danger.

episodes.name: Moving On (1)
episodes.overview: When her father is deployed overseas, Carole has to say goodbye to Pine Hollow and Starlight. It looks as though this could be the end of the Saddle Club.

episodes.name: Moving On (2)
episodes.overview: Devastated at having to leave Pine Hollow, and the idea that Starlight will join her father in the military, Carole runs away with her beloved horse. Lisa and Stevie join their best friend and embark on a radical course of action to keep Carole at Pine Hollow.

episodes.name: Don't Give a Hoot
episodes.overview: Something is upsetting the horses at night. Could it have something to do with the arrival of a mysterious new student, Desi?

episodes.name: Crossing the Line
episodes.overview: A favourite trail near Pine Hollow is closed off by Desi’s father, but the Saddle Club are forced to trespass on it when miniature donkey, Trouble lives up to his name.

episodes.name: Facing the Music
episodes.overview: The District Interclub Competition is about to take place at Pine Hollow. Stevie is dared by the boys to rough ride. They are so impressed at her zip, they invite her to be the third rider on their team in the Willow Creek Time Trial. Unfortunately, this clashes with the Saddle Club’s Musical Formation event.

episodes.name: The Dutchess and the Donkey
episodes.overview: When Stevie gets injured, Carole and Lisa offer to stop riding, out of solidarity. Stevie thinks this is a silly idea, but Veronica realises she can work the angle when she sees a magnificent racehorse brought to Pine Hollow. The horse is called Danville Dutchess, but Veronica knows she is really Temptation.

episodes.name: All that Glitters
episodes.overview: The Saddle Club happens upon a disused gold mine and hear its history from Jess’s grandfather, an ex-circus strongman called Orlando. Veronica heaps scorn on the old timer, so the Saddle Club resolves to teach her some manners … but things come unstuck.

episodes.name: One Step Forward
episodes.overview: Having forged a bond with Midnight, Simon cannot stomach the thought of the beautiful horse being put down … so he resolves to do something about it – and the Saddle Club are quick to involve themselves in a good cause.

episodes.name: Cut to the Quick
episodes.overview: It is the annual trials to set the rankings for the Pine Hollow students and Veronica is looking down the barrel of coming second to Stevie … this prompts Veronica to do something extreme.

episodes.name: Pioneer Day
episodes.overview: When Stevie finds a championship medallion in Old Sweetwater, she reunites the medal with its reclusive owner Rosemary Cross who overcomes her tragic past to horse ride again.

episodes.name: Itchy
episodes.overview: Carole develops allergic symptoms and fears she has an allergy to horses. She swears Lisa and Stevie to secrecy, but they worry that the allergy is making Carole an unsafe rider. Could this be the end of the Saddle Club?

episodes.name: Lisa's Choice (1)
episodes.overview: Out of the blue, Diablo returns to Pine Hollow and Lisa makes him welcome ... but Belle falls sick and Stevie becomes convinced that Diablo has brought a killer disease in from the wilds.

episodes.name: Lisa's Choice (2)
episodes.overview: Pine Hollow is quarantined by a suspected outbreak of equine influenza. Lisa has to bring Diablo in to establish if he is the source of the outbreak.

episodes.name: Seeing is Believing
episodes.overview: A mystery pony appears at Pine Hollow and follows Carole everywhere, which is a good thing since it saves her life.

episodes.name: Trouble Free
episodes.overview: When Veronica removes Trouble from the stables, she upsets the miniature donkey and his companion Danville Dutchess, who escape on a cross-country adventure. Only Jess and Melanie's detective work can find the donkey, the million-dollar racehorse and save Veronica's hide.

episodes.name: Outfoxed
episodes.overview: An adventurous mock fox hunt turns dire for Simon the Fox when he rides into dangerous terrain and is injured. Will the other Pine Hollow students stop bickering and find him in time?

episodes.name: Staying the Distance
episodes.overview: As Lisa continues to improve her jumping skills, giving Carole and Veronica a serious run for top spot, Prancer’s old leg injury flares up. Now Lisa must face a difficult decision – say goodbye to her steady reliable old horse in favour of a newer more athletic one, or settle for always being in third place.

episodes.name: Borrowing Freedom
episodes.overview: When Garnet refuses to make the double oxer jump, Veronica is humiliated and implements cruel measures to make Garnet more obedient. Determined to make it to the regionals, Veronica hires a horse breaker before she realises it’s her own fear of failure that is really holding Garnet back.

episodes.name: Pedigree
episodes.overview: When Veronica hears Samantha Askew, a young wealthy girl with a link to the royal family, is visiting Pine Hollow, she sets about improving everything and everyone. Little does Veronica know, "Sam" doesn't have pedigree taste, as she befriends Stevie and becomes fond of rough riding.

episodes.name: Friends and Family
episodes.overview: After an argument with her sister, Melanie is distraught to hear Lisa wish she didn't exist. Upset, Melanie runs away on her pony and Lisa must venture out with Prancer in order to find her and make things right.

episodes.name: Desk Jockey
episodes.overview: Devastated after failing his Bernouli Training School audition, Jack tries to resign from Pine Hollow. Wanting him to stay, the Saddle Club convince Max to let Jack work in the office and try to reignite Jack's love of horses. Meanwhile Veronica gets Bernouli to give Jack another chance with a new wild horse, Striker.

episodes.name: Musical Chairs
episodes.overview: Trapped at Pine Hollow due to flash flooding, the students are forced to endure a sleepover. When Desi goes hyper after she thinks she’s eaten paprika, she takes delight in telling everyone how it really is.

episodes.name: Breaking Up is Hard to Do
episodes.overview: When Stevie and Lisa have an argument on the Saddle Club Anniversary, it looks like the group could be splitting up. It is up to Carole to make the girls look beyond their differences and remember their love of horses, in order to save their friendship.

episodes.name: Happy Trails
episodes.overview: As part of their final assessment, the Pine Hollow students take part in an overnight endurance ride. But when the group starts bickering and Garnet goes missing, the students must use their survival skills and teamwork to find the horse and make their way back to civilization.

episodes.name: Riding to England
episodes.overview: After Carole is selected for a scholarship at a prestigious international riding academy, the Saddle Club must host a JB’s musical fundraiser, so Carole and Starlight can afford to travel overseas and take part in the opportunity of a lifetime.
